item.title: About
item.description: Hello World, I’m Jack Cary, an independent software consultant in Burlington, Vermont. I specialize in Business Process Automation, Cloud Orchestration, Continuous Delivery, Systems Administration, and RESTful Web Service development. I offer cost-effective software solutions to businesses of all sizes, ultimately saving valuable time and resources through the power of automation. I have successfully implemented automated software solutions across a wide range of industries, including healthcare, transportation, hospitality, event management, and digital marketing.
